name: Cromukent's Arcade
description:
The first game has been rolled into Cromukent's Arcade.  Join us in welcoming Snake Game!

Here is what people are saying:

  • "Snakes, why did it have to be snakes." - Harrison F.
  • "There are (expletive) snakes in the (expletive) arcade." - Samuel J.
  • "Call me Snake" - Kurt R.

More games coming to the arcade soon! (probably)
